description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The New World in 1859. Being the United States and Canada, illustrated and described, etc. [With illustrations.]", "Appendix. Bailliere Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003734248 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
